name: Wayne Gretzky
featuredQuote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take
quotes: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take
Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
The remarkable thing is, we have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day.
When you have vision it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic.

name: Charles Swindoll
featuredQuote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it
quotes: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it
We are all faced with a series of great opportunities brilliantly disguised as impossible situations.
Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
The remarkable thing is, we have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day.
When you have vision it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic.

name: Henry David Thoreau
featuredQuote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined
quotes: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined
